Summary: ENGINE BLOCK CRACKED, RESULTING IN OIL LEAKAGE, ALSO CLUTCH  AND DRIVESHAFT FAILED.  *AK

VEHICLE WAS HIT BY ANOTHER VEHICLE THAT RAN A STOP SIGN, THE PICK-UP TRUCK ROLLED ONTO THE DRIVER'S SIDE, THE GAS CAP SPUN OFF, CAUSING GAS TO LEAK WHICH IMMEDIATELY IGNITED AS THE VEHICLE SLID DOWN THE HIGHWAY, BOTH OCCUPANTS OF THE VEHICLE WERE KILLED IN THIS ACCIDENT BECAUSE OF THE FIRE.   *SLC

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1962 FORD GALAXY 500 EXCEL CONVERTIBLE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE PURCHASED A POWER STEERING BOX TO REPLACE THE ORIGINAL.  THE PURCHASE WAS SUPPOSEDLY AN UPDATE OF THE ORIGINAL BOX, HOWEVER IT TURNED OUT TO BE A MODIFIED STEERING BOX.  HE STATED THAT THE BOX IS UNSAFE BECAUSE IT AUTOMATICALLY TURNS TO THE RIGHT WHEN DRIVING OR WHILE THE ENGINE IS SHUT OFF.  THE PURCHASE DATE, ENGINE SIZE, AND CORRECT VIN WERE UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 80,000.
PREMATURE HEAD GASKET FAILURE RESULTED IN A COMPLETE ENGINE OVERHAUL.*ET
